OPENCTI_URL.description: The base URL of the OpenCTI instance.

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The API token to connect to OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.description: The period of time to await between two runs of the connector.

PROMPTINTEL_API_URL.description: Base URL for the PromptIntel API.

PROMPTINTEL_API_KEY.description: API key for authenticating with PromptIntel.

PROMPTINTEL_TLP_LEVEL.description: TLP marking level: clear, green, amber, amber+strict, red.

PROMPTINTEL_SEVERITY_FILTER.description: Filter prompts by severity: critical, high, medium, low. Empty for all.

PROMPTINTEL_CATEGORY_FILTER.description: Filter prompts by category: manipulation, abuse, patterns, outputs. Empty for all.

PROMPTINTEL_IMPORT_START_LIMIT.description: Maximum number of prompts to fetch on the first run (historical backfill).

PROMPTINTEL_IMPORT_LIMIT.description: Maximum number of prompts to fetch on subsequent runs.
